p:
We used a time series seasonal decomposition analysis to detect the seasonality and the trends for monthly imported CHIKV cases and monthly overseas arrivals. The model is given by: Y
t
= T
t
+ S
t
+ E
t , where Y
t denotes the original times series for the monthly imported cases and the monthly overseas arrivals; T
t , S
t and E
t denote the trend and cycle component, the seasonal component and the error component, respectively. The seasonal component can capture the seasonal pattern of the data, a pattern that will likely repeat every year. Analyses were undertaken using IBM SPSS Statistics 25.
